amendment.description: An amendment that sought to provide funds for quality of life enhancements for U.S. servicemembers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that, of the funds made available for reconstruction and relief for Iraq, one half of those funds shall be treated as a loan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 226 (Roll no. 546).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Obey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
